image.type: search / network / content / collect / comment / halo / message
image.description: The default image type supports incoming image URLs
image.description_zh: 缺省图片类型，支持传入图片 URL

image-size.description: Image size, default unit is px
image-size.description_zh: 图片大小，默认单位为 px

image-mode.description: Preview the mode property of the image
image-mode.description_zh: 预览图片的 mode 属性

url-prefix.description: The image path prefix, which points to the directory where the image is located, is used to stitch together the image URL.
url-prefix.description_zh: 图片路径前缀，指向图片所在目录，用于拼接图片 URL。
